name: Military
description: Military civilizations thrive on weapons and force. They'll use every resource available to destroy other nations.

name: Aggressive
description: Aggressive tribes try to exterminate the competition. They ruthlessly attack and hoard all the resources for themselves.

name: Predator
description: Predatory creatures spend their lives searching for prey. They'd sooner make extinct an entire species than "dance" or "charm".

name: Zealot
description: Zealots are certain that their beliefs are the only truth that matters. Those who do not feel the same way are not worthy to exist in this galaxy.

name: Economic
description: Economic civilizations use cash and trade routes to influence other nations. They'll make alliances, but it's usually a better deal for them.

name: Bard
description: Bards are the social, outgoing entertainers of the cosmos. The galaxy is their personal playground.

name: Omnivore
description: Omnivorous cells eat any type of food available.

name: Friendly
description: Friendly tribes understand the importance of teamwork. They form alliances to share resources and prosper with other tribes.

name: Religious
description: Religious civilizations harness the power of words and ideas to convert other nations to their way of thinking.

name: Scientist
description: Scientists are logical and calculating. The galaxy exists to be studied and understood.

name: Wanderer
description: Wanderers want to sample a little bit of everything. The galaxy is vast and they want to experience it all.

name: Herbivore
description: Herbivorous cells consume a diet of plant matter.

name: Ecologist
description: Ecologists are the protectors of nature. Species that attempt to exploit and corrupt the galaxy must be exterminated.

name: Diplomat
description: Diplomats are negotiators and problem solvers. Peace will come to the galaxy only through open communication between species.

name: Trader
description: Traders are in it for the profit. Their only allegiance is to the almighty Sporebuck.

name: Adaptable
description: Adaptable creatures have many friends and many enemies. They make choices based on the current situation.

name: Industrious
description: Industrious tribes seize the moment, attacking or forming alliances when necessary. They make great allies, but watch out.

name: Shaman
description: Shamans understand that all life shares a common bond. The entire galaxy exists within us all.

name: Carnivore
description: Carnivorous cells consume a diet of meat.

name: Warrior
description: Warriors take what they want and never ask for permission. The galaxy is a prize to be claimed by the strongest.

name: Knight
description: Knights are noble warriors that fight for right, not for personal gain. Peace will come to the galaxy only when evil has been vanquished.

name: Social
description: Social creatures are constantly searching for new friends and allies. Meeting a new species is the highlight of their day.
